item.title: ROP: 02 - Oracle's Plan
item.author: weerawat.paw@gmail.com (Weerawat Pawanawiwat)
item.description: DISCLAIMER: This is the solution to the challenge, I recommed you to try it yourself first. Challenge Name: Oracle’s Plan Type: Web Score: 100 pts Link: https://game.rop.sh Oracle’s Plan challenge description The mission provides us a link to a website, which looks like this: Webpage of the challenge It is a simple page with an image and a line of text. The first thing to do, of course, is to view the page source.
